introDescription:
The most secure messaging.
Using an encrypted and
decentralized P2P network.
signUpDesc: Remember your password, and you won't be able to restore it. Make a backup copy of your profile, so it is stored only on your device.
signOutQuestion: Do you really want to log out of your account ?
creatingContainerDesc: Please wait while Utopia is creating your new Encrypted Container.
pleaseWait: This process may take several minutes.
addContactDesc: To add a new user to your contact list please enter a Public Key or scan uCode.
editNicknameDesc: This nickname is only visible to you in the contact list and chats. To return the original contact nickname, click the button below.
deleteAccountDesc: If you delete the encrypted container, access to the account will be lost forever.
deleteAccountQuestion: Do you really want to delete a account?
importUtopiaAccountDesc:
Utopia cannot restore your chat history, emails or files using this method, as they are only saved in a Encrypted Container. 

After the import process is successfull completed, a new Encrypted Container will be created. 

You will be able to access your account balances, purchased properties and transaction history.
importAccountMethodDesc: Please select a method to restore access to your account.
enterPrivateKeyDesc: Enter your Private Key or seed phrase to restore access to the Public Key.
enablePushNotificationsDesc:
Please note that push system uses platform vendor service to provide functionality (Firebase for Android, APNS for iOS).

We do not send any data to providers except the fact of the new message available for you.

All your message contents and message sender are encrypted and not available to push service.
documentPermissionDenied:
To see your gallery content directly
from here, access to your phone's
media storage is required
